TneTabControl Events

Events
 NameDescription
OnAfterAddItem

This event is called after a new Item is added

OnAfterAddSidebarControl

Represents property OnAfterAddSidebarControl.

OnAfterDeleteItem

Represents property OnAfterDeleteItem.

OnAfterDeleteSidebarControl

Represents property OnAfterDeleteSidebarControl.

OnBeforeAddItem

This event is called before a new Item is added

OnBeforeAddSidebarControl

Represents property OnBeforeAddSidebarControl.

OnBeforeDeleteItem

Represents property OnBeforeDeleteItem.

OnBeforeDeleteSidebarControl

Represents property OnBeforeDeleteSidebarControl.

OnBeforePopupMenu

This event is fired just before the popup menu is shown.
